## Regular expressions master list created from public sources.
## WARNING!!!! Do not edit this file, use CustomRegexes.txt for your own regexes instead.
## Last updated: 2018-01-15

URI	Cerber_ransom_note	\.top\/[A-Z0-9]{4}(\-[A-Z0-9]{4}){4}\?iframe&_=[0-9]{13}$
URI	Chthonic_C2	pationare\.bit\/	http://www.malware-traffic-analysis.net/2016/12/27/index.html
URI	Disdain_EK	\/[a-zA-Z0-9]{24}\/[a-zA-Z0-9]{12}\.(php(\?ids=[a-zA-Z0-9]{8})?|swf)$	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/threat-analysis/2017/11/disdain-exploit-kit-served-side-social-engineering/
URI	Drive-by_Mining	coin-?hive|crypto-loot\.com|\/lib\/cryptonight-asmjs\.min\.js	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/threat-analysis/2017/09/drive-by-mining-and-ads-the-wild-wild-west/
URI	Fobos_Campaign	\.(info|biz)\/\w+\/(index\.php)?\?(r[0-9]=1&)?[a-z]{2}=[0-9]{12}$	https://www.malwarebytes.com/pdf/white-papers/CybercrimeTacticsAndTechniques-Q2-2017.pdf
URI	KaiXin	\/([A-Z][a-z]){3}\.jar$	http://malware-traffic-analysis.net/2017/11/17/index.html
URI	Magniber_Ransom	\/preland\w{16}$
URI	Magnigate	-0(-[0-9]{5,7}){4,12}-$	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/cybercrime/2017/08/enemy-at-the-gates-reviewing-the-magnitude-exploit-kit-redirection-chain/
URI	Magnitude_EK	^http:\/\/([a-z0-9]{3,30}\.){2}[a-z]{3,30}\/([0-9]{19}&[0-9]{7}|[a-z0-9]{32})$	http://www.malware-traffic-analysis.net/2017/08/04/index.html
URI	Ngay_Campaign	(\/sm)?\/\?_subid=[0-9a-z]{10,20}&_token=uuid_[0-9a-z]{10,20}_[0-9a-z]{30,40}\.[0-9]{8}$	http://www.nao-sec.org/2017/12/survey-of-ngay-campaign.html
URI	Ngay_CoinMiner_C2	ngay[0-9]{2,4}\.ru\/buon	http://www.nao-sec.org/2017/12/survey-of-ngay-campaign.html
URI	Punycode(IDN)	^https?:\/\/xn--[\w\.-]+\/
URI	RIG_EK	(http(|s):\/\/|^)(?!www)([^.](([a-z0-9\-]{1,35}\.){2}[a-z\.]{2,15})|\b(?:\d{1,3}\.){3}\d{1,3}\b)\/\?[MN]\w{7}&(\w+(&|==?&?|\-)){10}	http://www.malware-traffic-analysis.net/2017/08/01/index.html
URI	Rulan_Campaign	\.ru\/[a-z]{3}$	https://www.malwarebytes.com/pdf/white-papers/CybercrimeTacticsAndTechniques-Q2-2017.pdf
URI	Seamless_gate	^http:\/\/(\w+\.info|xn--[\w\.-]+|(25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)){3})\/((test|gav)?[0-9]{1,3}\.php$|(japan|canada|usa|fr)\/?)	https://umbrella.cisco.com/blog/2017/03/29/seamless-campaign-delivers-ramnit-via-rig-ek/
URI	Terror_EK	(\/\w+\.gif\?\w+=[0-9]{10}|(\/([a-z]{3,15}\.){3}[a-z]{3,10}){2}\/[a-z]{4}\.[a-z]{3}|\/([a-z]{3,15}\.){3}[a-z]{3,10}\/[a-z]{4}-[a-z-]{5,7}\.[a-z]{3})$	http://malware-traffic-analysis.net/2017/10/17/index.html
URI	TSS	\.tk\/\?number=8[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{3}-[0-9]{4}$
SourceCode	Drive-by_Mining	\/lib\/(coinhive|miner).min.js	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/threat-analysis/2017/09/drive-by-mining-and-ads-the-wild-wild-west/
SourceCode	Fobos_Campaign	\.(info|biz)\/\w+\/(index\.php)?\?(r[0-9]=1&)?[a-z]{2}=[0-9]{12}
SourceCode	EITest_FakeFont	<\/a><div id="upe0" onclick="eu0\(\)" >	https://www.proofpoint.com/us/threat-insight/post/EITest-Nabbing-Chrome-Users-Chrome-Font-Social-Engineering-Scheme
SourceCode	EITest_TSS	function checkTarget\(a\)\{if\(!getCookie\("popundr"\)\)
SourceCode	KaiXin	(\-1,){10}	http://malware-traffic-analysis.net/2017/11/17/index.html
SourceCode	Magnigate	this\[\([0-9]{2},[0-9]+(<|&&?|\-)[0-9]{2},[0-9]+\)\.t\\u006fS\\u0074	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/cybercrime/2017/08/enemy-at-the-gates-reviewing-the-magnitude-exploit-kit-redirection-chain/
SourceCode	Magnitude_EK	var [a-z]{3,15} = \{"va\\u006cu\\u\w+\\u\w+": function \(\) \{\w+\(\);return 1;\}\};	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/cybercrime/2017/08/enemy-at-the-gates-reviewing-the-magnitude-exploit-kit-redirection-chain/
SourceCode	Redirection_RIG_EK	(http(|s):\/\/|^)(?!www)([^.](([a-z0-9\-]{1,35}\.){2}[a-z\.]{2,15})|\b(?:\d{1,3}\.){3}\d{1,3}\b)\/\?[MN]\w{7}&(\w+(&|==?&?|\-)){10}
SourceCode	TSS_audio	(beep|alert|warning|Texts)[0-9]?\.mp3" type="audio
SourceCode	TSS_TFN	\\n\\nToll Free: ?[0-9-]+(\\n){20}
